provisions.part: Part III – Financial and miscellaneous provisions
provisions.title: Transfer of personnel
provisions.content: (1) The President shall in accordance with the advice of the Commission given in consultation with the Public Services Commission and within such period as the President shall determine upon the coming into force of this Act, transfer to the Commission such number, as the President may determine, of personnel employed immediately before the coming into force of this Act by any of the bodies, agencies and offices dissolved under section 33. The President shall in accordance with the advice of the Commission given in consultation with the Public Services Commission and within such period as the President shall determine upon the coming into force of this Act, transfer to the Commission such number, as the President may determine, of personnel employed immediately before the coming into force of this Act by any of the bodies, agencies and offices dissolved under section 33. (2) Where a person to whom subsection (1) applies is not transferred under the subsection the appointing authority shall deal with the appointment as he considers fit including payment of the applicable retirement benefits and severance awards.
